english: CLOUD! I don't know how to stop this. Try it!
japanese: CLOUD！[止め]かたがわからないの。やってみて！

definitions: 時限[じげん] (n, adj-no) (school) period,period or division of time, time limit
english: …It's not a normal time bomb.
japanese: ……ただの[時限]爆弾じゃない

definitions: 通り[とおり] (ctr) avenue, street, way, road,coming and going, street traffic,flow (of water, air, etc.),transmission (of sound), reach (e.g. of voice),fame, reputation, popularity,the same status or way, as (e.g. as expected, as I said),understanding, comprehension,counter for sets of things, counter for methods, ways, types
透り[とおり] (n) penetration (as of light)
english: That's right. You'll have a hard time disarming that one.
japanese: その[とおり]。それを操作するのは難しい

definitions: 馬鹿[ばか] (n) fool, idiot,trivial matter, folly, absurdity,foolish, stupid, dull, absurd, ridiculous,Mactra chinensis (species of trough shell)
english: It'll blow the second some stupid jerk touches it.
japanese: どこかの[バカ]者が勝手にふれると困るからな”

definitions: 触れる[ふれる] (v1, vt) to touch, to feel,to experience, to come in contact with, to perceive,to touch on (a subject), to allude to, to refer to, to mention,to be in conflict with, to violate (law, copyright, etc.), to infringe,to proclaim, to make known, to spread (e.g. a rumour)
振れる[ふれる] (v1, vi) to swing, to shake, to wave,to veer, to deflect, to lean towards
狂れる[ふれる] (v1, vi) to go mad
english: It'll blow the second some stupid jerk touches it.
japanese: どこかのバカ者が勝手に[ふれる]と困るからな”

definitions: 止める[とめる] (v1, vt) to stop, to turn off,to park,to prevent, to suppress (a cough), to hold back (tears), to hold (one's breath), to relieve (pain),to stop (someone from doing something), to dissuade, to forbid, to prohibit,to notice, to be aware of, to concentrate on, to pay attention to, to remember, to bear in mind,to fix (in place), to fasten, to tack, to pin, to nail, to button, to staple,to detain, to keep in custody
泊める[とめる] (v1, vt) to give shelter to, to lodge, to put up, to accommodate
駐める[とめる] (v1, vt) to park
富める[とめる] (adj-f) rich, wealthy
english: Please, stop it!
japanese: おねがい、[とめ]て！

definitions: 設定[せってい] (n, vs) establishment, creation, posing (a problem), setting (movie, novel, etc.), scene,options setting, preference settings, configuration, setup
english: Only a Shinra Executive can set up or disarm the Emergency Plate Release System.
japanese: 緊急用プレート解除システムの[設定]と解除は神羅役員会の決定なしではできないのだ

definitions: 役員[やくいん] (n) officer, official, executive, staff
english: Only a Shinra Executive can set up or disarm the Emergency Plate Release System.
japanese: 緊急用プレート解除システムの設定と解除は神羅[役員]会の決定なしではできないのだ

definitions: 会[かい] (n, n-suf) meeting, assembly, party,association, club
会[え] (n) gathering (esp. Buddhist, festive, etc.)
english: Only a Shinra Executive can set up or disarm the Emergency Plate Release System.
japanese: 緊急用プレート解除システムの設定と解除は神羅役員[会]の決定なしではできないのだ

definitions: ゲスト (n) guest
english: I wouldn't try that…… You just might make me injure our special guest.
japanese: そんなことされると大切な[ゲスト]がケガするじゃないか

definitions: 我々[われわれ] (pn) we
english: Our orders were to find and catch the last remaining Ancient.
japanese: [われわれ]タークスにあたえられた命令は『古代種』の生き残りをつかまえろ、ということだけだ

definitions: 与える[あたえる] (v1, vt) to give (esp. to someone of lower status), to bestow, to grant, to confer, to present, to award,to provide, to afford, to offer, to supply,to assign,to cause,to pass (a variable to a function)
english: Our orders were to find and catch the last remaining Ancient.
japanese: われわれタークスに[あたえ]られた命令は『古代種』の生き残りをつかまえろ、ということだけだ

definitions: 生き残り[いきのこり] (n) survival,survivor, relic
english: Our orders were to find and catch the last remaining Ancient.
japanese: われわれタークスにあたえられた命令は『古代種』の[生き残り]をつかまえろ、ということだけだ

definitions: ワイヤ (n) wire,wire rope
english: Yo, we can use this wire to get out!
japanese: おい、この[ワイヤー]を使って脱出できるぜ！

definitions: 五十[ごじゅう] (n) fifty
磯[いそ] (n) (rocky) beach, seashore
イソ (pref) iso-
english: Once that Plate starts coming down it'll be too late. We gotta hurry!
japanese: 上のプレートが落ちてきたらひとたまりもないわ.[いそ]がなくちゃ！

definitions: 畜生[ちくしょう] (int) beast (i.e. any animal other than man),person reborn into the animal realm,brute (i.e. a contemptible human being),damn it, damn, Christ, for Christ's sake
蓄妾[ちくしょう] (n, vs) keeping a mistress (concubine)
english: God damn…
japanese: クッ！[ちくしょう]……

definitions: 倒す[たおす] (v5s, vt) to throw down, to bring down, to blow down, to fell, to knock down, to set (something) down on its side, to turn (something) on its side,to kill, to defeat, to beat,to overthrow, to trip up, to ruin,to leave unpaid, to cheat
転かす[こかす] (v4s, vt) to knock down, to knock over
english: They destroyed an entire village just to get to us! They killed so many people…
japanese: オレたちを[倒す]ために街ひとつつぶしちまうんだからな。いったい何人死んだんだ……

definitions: 何もかも[なにもかも] (exp, n, adv) anything and everything, just about everything
english: It ain't us! It's the damn Shinra! It's never been nobody but the Shinra!
japanese: [なにもかも]神羅のやつらがやったことじゃねえか！

definitions: 権力[けんりょく] (n, adj-no) (political) power, authority, influence
english: They're evil and destroyin' our planet just to…
japanese: 自分たちの金や[権力]のために星の命を吸い取る悪堂ども！

definitions: 吸い取る[すいとる] (v5r, vt) to suck up, to absorb, to squeeze (money)
english: They're evil and destroyin' our planet just to…
japanese: 自分たちの金や権力のために星の命を[吸い取る]悪堂ども！

definitions: 限り[かぎり] (suf) limit, limits, bounds,degree, extent, scope,as far as possible, as much as possible, to the best of one's ability, very much,unless (after neg. verb),the end, the last,as long as, only

切り[きり] (prt) end, finish, stop,bounds, limits,delivery date (of a futures contract),finale (of a noh song), end of an act (in jōruri or kabuki), final performance of the day (in vaudeville),counter for slices (esp. thick slices), counter for cuts (e.g. fish, meat),only, just,since, after,remaining (in a particular state)
english: build their power and line their own damn pockets with gold!
japanese: その神羅をつぶさない[限り]この星は死んじまうんだ！

definitions: 終わる[おわる] (v5r, vi, aux-v) to finish, to end, to close
english: Our fight ain't never gonna be over until we get rid of them!!
japanese: 神羅を倒すまでオレたちの戦いは[おわら]ねえ！！

definitions: 正当[せいとう] (adj-na, n) just, justifiable, right, due, proper, equitable, reasonable, legitimate, legal, lawful
english: Now listen good! The Ancients are the rightful rulers of this Planet!
japanese: よく聞け！古代種こそがこの星の[正当]なる支配者！

definitions: 支配[しはい] (n, vs) domination, rule, control,direction, management, guidance,control (e.g. over one's emotions), determining (e.g. one's fate), governing, influence, holding sway over
english: Now listen good! The Ancients are the rightful rulers of this Planet!
japanese: よく聞け！古代種こそがこの星の正当なる[支配]者！

definitions: 我[われ] (pref) I, me,oneself,you,prefix indicating familiarity or contempt
割れ[われ] (n) broken piece,below (a certain level, point, quantity, etc.), dropping below,illegal downloading and distribution of commercial software, warez
english: In my veins courses the blood of the Ancients. I am one of the rightful heirs to this planet!
japanese: [われ]こそ古代種の血をひきし者。この星の正統なる後継者！

definitions: 引く[ひく] (v5k, vi) to pull, to tug, to lead (e.g. a horse),to draw (attention, sympathy, etc.), to attract (e.g. interest),to draw back (e.g. one's hand), to draw in (one's chin, stomach, etc.), to pull in,to draw (a card, mahjong tile, etc.),to draw (a line, plan, etc.),to catch (a cold),to play (a stringed or keyboard instrument),to look up (e.g. a dictionary), to consult,to haul, to pull (vehicles),to subtract, to deduct,to recede, to ebb, to fade,to be descend from, to inherit (a characteristic),to quote, to cite, to raise (as evidence),to lay on (electricity, gas, etc.), to install (e.g. a telephone), to supply (e.g. water),to hold (e.g. a note),to apply (e.g. lipstick), to oil (e.g. a pan), to wax (e.g. a floor),to move back, to draw back, to recede,to lessen, to subside, to ebb,to resign, to retire, to quit
弾く[ひく] (v5k, vt) to play (a stringed or keyboard instrument)
退く[ひく] (v5k, vi) to move back, to draw back, to recede,to lessen, to subside, to ebb,to resign, to retire, to quit
轢く[ひく] (v5k, vt) to run over (with a vehicle), to knock down
挽く[ひく] (v5k, vt) to saw,to grind (e.g. coffee beans), to mill
惹く[ひく] (v5k, vt) to draw (attention, sympathy, etc.), to attract (e.g. interest)
english: In my veins courses the blood of the Ancients. I am one of the rightful heirs to this planet!
japanese: われこそ古代種の血を[ひき]し者。この星の正統なる後継者！

definitions: 正統[せいとう] (adj-na, n, adj-no) legitimate, orthodox, traditional
english: In my veins courses the blood of the Ancients. I am one of the rightful heirs to this planet!
japanese: われこそ古代種の血をひきし者。この星の[正統]なる後継者！

definitions: 後継[こうけい] (n) succession,successor
跡継ぎ[あとつぎ] (n) heir, inheritor,successor
english: In my veins courses the blood of the Ancients. I am one of the rightful heirs to this planet!
japanese: われこそ古代種の血をひきし者。この星の正統なる[後継]者！
